original_text: And he did what was right in the eyes of the Lord, yet not like David his father. He did in all things as Joash his father had done.
korean_text: 아마샤가 여호와 보시기에 정직히 행하였으나 그의 조상 다윗과는 같지 아니하였으며 그의 아버지 요아스가 행한 대로 다 행하였어도

sentences.original_text: And he did what was right in the eyes of the Lord
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 여호와 보시기에 정직한 일을 행하였고

sentences.original_text: yet not like David his father.
He did in all things as Joash his father had done.
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 아버지 요아스가 행한 모든 일 같이 행하였더라
